General.Name: Clipan Finance Indonesia Tbk
General.Description: PT. Clipan Finance Indonesia Tbk engages in the financial leasing, consumer financing, factoring, and sale and leaseback business in Indonesia. It offers new and used car financing; cash financing for wedding, house renovation, tours, worship trips, education, and other consumption needs; fleet financing; and heavy equipment financing for mining, industry, plantations, forestry, barges, tugboats, and production machinery. PT. Clipan Finance Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT. Clipan Finance Indonesia Tbk operates as a subsidiary of P.T. Bank Pan Indonesia Tbk.
